ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT: Recommendation for a home firewall
ygData.msgSnippet: I run on the second highest securtity setting with not trouble.  If you go the to most secure setting it blocks out EQ :)
ygData.messageBody:
I run on the second highest securtity setting with not trouble. If you go
the to most secure setting it blocks out EQ :)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Gordon Hughes [mailto:ghughes@...]
> Sent: Friday, October 06, 2000 9:09 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT: Recommendation for a home firewall
>
>
> You're right. I guess I am.
>
> I don't leave my pc hooked up 24/7, but I just read on the
> Black Ice site
> that a quarter of all DSL users have their pc's probed while
> they're online.
>
> Thanks for the tip, Rokenn. Any advice on settings to allow
> EQ to run?
>
>
> >If your on DSL you are networked.
> Teien
